00030 #include "Verbose.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00039 void Verbose::progressStep(int verbosity) {
00040   Param &p = getParam();
00041   
00042   if(verbosity <= p.m_Verbosity) {
00043     p.m_DotCount--;
00044     /* Check to see if it is time to call the step report function yet. */
00045     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < p.m_ProHandler.size(); i++) {
00046       if(p.m_DotCount <= 0 || p.m_ProHandler[i]->handleAll()) {
00047         p.m_ProHandler[i]->progressStep(verbosity);
00048       }
00049     }
00050     if(p.m_DotCount <= 0) {
00051       p.m_DotCount = p.m_DotMod; // reset the counter
00052     }
00053   }
00054 }
